How can I preconvert VRSCTEST to a new currency, NEWCOIN, before it is active?

To preconvert VRSCTEST to a new currency, NEWCOIN, before it is active, you can use the following command:
```
verus -chain=VRSCTEST sendcurrency "*" '[{"address":"alice@","amount":10, "convertto":"NEWCOIN", "preconvert":true, "refundto":"alice@"}]'
```
This command sends 10 units of VRSCTEST from the address "alice@" and preconverts it to NEWCOIN, with the option to refund the original amount to "alice@" if the conversion fails.
